## kernel3 variable

HOF subdiv kernel function for computing 2 split points from 3 source points, using weighted summation (thi.ng/vectors/addW3)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
kernel3: ([ua, ub, uc]: number[], [va, vb, vc]: number[]) => ([a, b, c]: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>[]) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec[]
```
